definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
variant of 琴[qin2], guqin or zither

sentences.english: Quartet for Flute, Oboe, Cello and Harpsichord.
sentences.chinese: 长笛四重奏，双簧管，大提琴和大键琴。

sentences.english: The oboe and cello sat alone , echoing tone for tone.
sentences.chinese: 双簧管和大提琴双重奏，音调此起彼伏。

sentences.english: He became one of the best known virtuoso cellists of his time.
sentences.chinese: 他成为其中最知名的大提琴演奏家，他的时间。

sentences.english: The cellist's bowing was very sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 这位大提琴手的手法非常敏捷。

sentences.english: Ugly Naked Guy plays the Cello.
The euphonious sound of Carrie's cello playing always puts me at ease.
sentences.chinese: 嘉莉悦耳的大提琴演奏总让我心旷神怡。

sentences.english: If the cello, such as , tell, the guitar is deeply lovely.
sentences.chinese: 大提琴如泣如诉，吉他通透玲珑。

sentences.english: I remember hearing Yo-Yo Ma play the Bach sonatas for cello and keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我听过马友友拉的巴赫大提琴与键盘奏鸣曲。

sentences.english: The concert was a solo played by Yo Yo Ma, who is an excellent cellist.
sentences.chinese: 这场音乐会是马友友独奏，他是一位优秀的大提琴家。

sentences.english: Is the cello listening to the answer, or is it oblivious?
sentences.chinese: 大提琴是否接受了这个回答，还是对其置若罔闻？

sentences.english: C. G. : You still play the cello?.
The article one mouthful fragrant , let the light cello song, such as tassels, fill the air.
sentences.chinese: 品一口香茗，让淡淡的大提琴曲如流苏般弥漫。

sentences.english: Leslie: The Physics Department string quartet needs a new cellist.
sentences.chinese: 物理系弦乐四重奏还缺一个大提琴。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

sentences.english: It takes years of discipline to be an outstanding cellist .
sentences.chinese: 要成为一名卓越的大提琴手需要多年的训练。

sentences.english: Sonata for cello &piano No. 5 in D major, Op.

definition: instrument of the violin family (violin, viola, cello or double bass)/CL:把[ba3]
double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
